steps.title: Get your dream website up and running in no time with AstroWind.

step1.title: Step 1: Free Initial Consultation
step1.description: Start with a free, no-obligation conversation, online or in person, where we get to know each other. We clarify your goals, challenges, and whether my approach is the right fit for your needs.

step2.title: Step 2: Personalized Concept
step2.description: Based on your situation and goals, I create a tailored plan — whether it's focused on mental training, leadership development, team identity, or holistic well-being.

step3.title: Step 3: Collaborative Work Phase
step3.description: Through regular sessions or workshops, we put the strategies into practice. You'll receive practical tools, feedback, and reflection methods that empower sustainable growth.

step4.title: Step 4: Independent Implementation
step4.description: My ultimate goal is to make you (or your team) self-sufficient. I equip you with the skills and strategies needed to continue thriving independently — long after our collaboration.
